text_result.title: MedlinePlus 			Medical Encyclopedia: <span class="mak_1"><span class="mak_1">Morni</span>ng </span><span class="mak_1"><span class="mak_1">sickn</span>ess </span>
text_result.fulltxt:
<ul>
 <li> Medical Encyclopedia Morning sickness Morning sickness usually begins during the first month of pregnancy and continues until the 14th to 16th week Although some women can have nausea and vomiting through their entire pregnancy Morning sickness<strong>  . . .</strong></li>
 <li><strong>. . . </strong> sickness is very common and does not hurt the baby in any way The exact cause of morning sickness is unknown However it may be caused by either hormonal changes or lower blood sugar during early pregnancy Emotional stress traveling or some foods<strong>. . . </strong></li>
 <li><strong>. . . </strong> contained herein is strictly prohibited 			 MedlinePlus 			Medical Encyclopedia Morning sickness<strong>. . . </strong></li>
 </ul>
